Name: Shiro
About the game: Holo and Shiro are twin sisters who travel the world since childhood in search of adventure. Once they were attacked by the evil witch Satella and took Shiro to her gloomy cave. Now Holo has to find his sister. Help Holo find her sister. Overcome a dense forest, an ancient temple, dangerous dungeons and destroy enemies in this pixelated adventure platformer! Features Balancing combat and platforming Over 25 levels Unique events and mini-games Challenging gameplay funny rabbits A dynamic and lively world Shiro, my dear sister. Wherever you are now, know that we will definitely meet again. I promise.
